attributes.action: Order a full review of the amount of compensation paid by the Criminal Injuries Compensation Authority.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
A full review is needed when a system allows a criminal such as Peter Sutcliffe to receive a higher level of compensation than innocent people, such as Robert Thornton and  Nick Horobin, suffering acts of violence while going about their day-to-day business.

We call upon the Government to rectify this and allow fairer compensation for the innocent and stop payments to convicted criminals.
